description:
Designed for those times you want sweat pant comfort but with a little more style. Paired with your favourite new sneakers when stepping out, or just a pair of fuzzy socks when staying in, the Heritage Patch joggers are easy to love.

  • Soft blend of recycled cotton and poly, wears well, breathes well, and dries quickly
  • Plenty of pockets to keep daily necessities close
  • Elasticised cuffs keep the warmth in
  • Circular design product life cycle, made from recycled materials and recyclable at the end of its life
  • Regular fit wears like an old favourite
name: The North Face Heritage Patch Jogger - Women's
